directions: Pulse together all ingredients in a food processor until tomato is finely chopped and butter is pale pink. Transfer to a sheet of wax paper or parchment paper and roll into a log about 1 1/2 inches thick. Twist ends of paper to enclose butter and chill until firm, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped drained oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes
1/4 teaspoon finely grated fresh orange zest
title: Sun-Dried Tomato Butter
